      • getNominalSize

        public static java.lang.String getNominalSize(ByteSize size)
        Returns a value of largest prefix that will be greater than 1, for example if input is of size 1100 B, it will be converted to string 1.1 (suffix kB not appended).
        Parameters:
        size - input size
        Returns:
        string representation of largest, non-fractional size prefix

      • getNominalSpeed

        public static java.lang.String getNominalSpeed(ByteSpeed speed)
        Returns a value of largest, non-fractional speed prefix, for example if input is of speed 1100 B, it will be converted to string 1.1 (suffix kB/s not appended).
        Parameters:
        speed - input speed
        Returns:
        string representation of largest, non-fractional speed prefix

      • msToHumanReadable

        public static java.lang.String msToHumanReadable(long ms)
        Converts milliseconds to human readable format. Converted to maximum order of hours, including any fractions as minutes and fractional seconds.
        Parameters:
        ms - input time in milliseconds
        Returns:
        human readable formatted time
